## Validation.ValidatorTraits.(constructor)

Constructs a new [ValidatorTraits](./ts-utils.validation.validatortraits.md) optionally initialized with the supplied base and initial values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(init?: Partial<ValidatorTraitValues>, base?: ValidatorTraitValues);
```

</th><th>

Type

</td><td>

Partial&lt;[ValidatorTraitValues](./ts-utils.validation.validatortraitvalues.md)<!-- -->&gt;


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Partial initial values to be set in the resulting [Validator](./ts-utils.validation.validator.md)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

base


</td><td>

[ValidatorTraitValues](./ts-utils.validation.validatortraitvalues.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Base values to be used when no initial values are present.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

## Remarks

Initial values take priority over base values, which fall back to the global default values.
